name: Invigorate
help: Increases level scaling of the spell

name: Energize
help: Increases level scaling of the spell

name: Close Range
help: Gives a spell range of close range

name: Short Range
help: Gives a spell range of short range

name: Line
help: The spell now affects a line within range

name: Cube
help: The spell now affects several cubes within range

name: Multi Target
help: The spell now targets additional targets within half range of the first target
